categories.name: Header & Navigation
criteria: Dropdown menu on 'Menu' hover with at least 4 categories.
Dark/Light mode toggle with localStorage persistence.
Quick links to Home, Signature Dishes, Reservation Form, Chatbot, Footer.

categories.name: Signature Dishes Section
criteria: Display first 3 dishes by default with a 'Load More' button.
Filter buttons by category (Veg, Non-Veg, Chef Specials).
Hover tooltip with description and price.
Smooth state transitions on filter/load more.

categories.name: Menu Pages (React Router)
criteria: Pages map over data array correctly.
Seamless navigation using React Router DOM.

categories.name: Reservation Form
criteria: All fields present: Name, Email, Phone, Guests, Date/Time picker.

categories.name: Chatbot Section
criteria: Scrollable chat area with bot/user messages.

categories.name: Footer
criteria: Dynamic opening hours logic shows 'We’re Open/Closed'.

categories.name: Responsiveness
criteria: Fully responsive across devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).
Nav bar and dropdown adapt for mobile.

categories.name: Git & GitHub
criteria: Proper branching strategy (dev, feature branches, PRs).
Complete README.md with team roles, features, tech stack, and live link.

categories.name: Deployment
criteria: Site accessible via live URL and loads correctly.
